Package models

Class CareerCenterStaff

java.lang.Object
models.User
models.CareerCenterStaff
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApprovalProcessor, InternshipViewer
public class CareerCenterStaff extends User implements ApprovalProcessor, InternshipViewer
Represents career center staff member with approval and viewing capabilities. Staff members can approve company representatives, internships, and withdrawal requests, as well as view various statistics and internship information.
See Also:
  • User
  • ApprovalProcessor
  • InternshipViewer
  • CompanyRepresentative
  • InternshipOpportunity
  • Student

      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier for the staff member
      name - the full name of the staff member
      department - the department the staff member belongs to
      internshipViewer - the service for viewing internship opportunities

    • approveCompanyRepresentatives

      public void approveCompanyRepresentatives(List<CompanyRepresentative> reps)
      Approves pending company representatives through an interactive menu. Displays all unapproved representatives and allows selective approval.
      Specified by:
      approveCompanyRepresentatives in interface ApprovalProcessor
      Parameters:
      reps - the list of company representatives to process

    • approveInternships

      public void approveInternships(List<CompanyRepresentative> reps)
      Approves pending internship opportunities through interactive prompts. Displays each pending internship and asks for approval decision.
      Specified by:
      approveInternships in interface ApprovalProcessor
      Parameters:
      reps - the list of company representatives whose internships to review

    • processWithdrawals

      public void processWithdrawals(List<Student> students)
      Processes student withdrawal requests through an interactive menu system. Allows approving, rejecting individual requests, or approving all pending requests.
      Specified by:
      processWithdrawals in interface ApprovalProcessor
      Parameters:
      students - the list of students to check for withdrawal requests
